data: Mr. Ricardo, when the excitements of the Villa Rose were done with, returned to Grosvenor Square and resumed the busy, unnecessary life of an amateur.
The Affair at the Semiramis Hotel
A. E. W. (Alfred Edward Woodley) Mason
